description: This file defines the main route component for the landing page of an enterprise CI/CD platform website. It includes metadata, navigation, hero section, features, integrations, case studies, testimonials, pricing, CTA, contact form, and footer, comprising a full homepage layout.

methods.name: NavLink
methods.description: A React component for rendering a navigation link with styling.

methods.name: Stat
methods.description: A React component to display a statistic with value and label.

methods.name: Index
methods.description: Main React component for the homepage, managing state and rendering the entire landing page layout.
